verses.verse: Give unto YHVH, O ye mighty, give unto YHVH glory and strength.
Give unto YHVH the glory due unto his name; worship YHVH in the beauty of holiness.
The voice of YHVH is upon the waters: the El of glory thundereth: YHVH is upon many waters.
The voice of YHVH is powerful; the voice of YHVH is full of majesty.
The voice of YHVH breaketh the cedars; yea, YHVH breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
The voice of YHVH divideth the flames of fire.
The voice of YHVH shaketh the wilderness; YHVH shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
The voice of YHVH maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
YHVH sitteth upon the flood; yea, YHVH sitteth King for ever.
YHVH will give strength unto his people; YHVH will bless his people with peace.
